talk.author: did:plc:7wfprynmu34zc2t3auhfqpws
talk.utter:
Your SAT reading comprehension score was probably double digits.  

The post implied they were noble, it didn't flat-out state it.  There's this thing in writing where you don't use the same word twice. 

You pull oars for genocide like Ben Hur did for freedom.
